name: THREE BUSHI
description:
The game was developed in 2 days for Selectel Hackathon

Why is the whole Selectel Village on fire? Wife, take the children... It seems that an ancient evil has awakened, a primal thirst for human flesh and an irresistible desire to swallow the whole world is already close. Demons and Dinodragons, Giants and Ogres - they all stand in our way to a peaceful life. But only three warriors, whose valor allows them to fight, rose to defend the village.

Rōnin is a once glorious stench that has lost its master, but not lost its honor. He is fast and strong, but the lack of armor makes itself felt.

Kyūdo is a brave archer whose arrow is capable of striking even the most cautious enemy. Prefers ranged attacks to melee attacks.

Sūmo is the kindest of them all. Thanks to its strength, it is able to destroy a whole squad of villains at once.

Gather your warriors and fight off the forces of darkness!
